title: Adobe Premiere Pro Speed Test - macOS vs Windows - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Adobe Premiere Pro Speed Test - macOS vs Windows - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Adobe Premiere Pro runs on macOS and Windows. However, rumor has it that it's more "optimized" for Windows over macOS. Today, Krazy Ken and Maniac Mike test this urban legend. Which one comes out on top?  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!
